title: TextInput
name: TextInput
description:
Lets you place a single-line text entry box in a cfform. The tag also gives you control over
  font characteristics.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: A name for the cftextinput control.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Initial value that displays in the text control.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Yes or No. If Yes, the user must enter or change text. Default is No.

attributes.name: range
attributes.description: Minimum value, maximum value range, separated by a comma. Valid only for numeric data.

attributes.name: validate
attributes.description:
date: verifies format mm/dd/yy.
            eurodate: verifies date format dd/mm/yyyy.
            time: verifies time format hh:mm:ss.
            float: verifies floating point format.
            integer: verifies integer format.
            telephone: verifies telephone format ###-###-####. The
                separator can be a blank. Area code and exchange must
                begin with digit 1 - 9.
            zipcode: verifies, in U.S. formats only, 5- or 9-digit
                format #####-####. The separator can be a blank.
            creditcard: strips blanks and dashes; verifies number using
                mod10 algorithm. Number must have 13-16 digits.
            social_security_number: verifies format ###-##-####. The
                separator can be a blank.
            regular_expression: matches input against pattern
                attribute.

attributes.name: onValidate
attributes.description:
The name of a JavaScript function used to validate user input. The form object, input object,
	and input object value are passed to the routine, which should return TRUE if validation succeeds and
	FALSE otherwise. When used, the validate attribute is ignored.

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: Message text to display if validation fails.

attributes.name: onError
attributes.description: Name of a JavaScript function to execute in the event of a failed validation.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Number of characters displayed before horizontal scroll bar displays.

attributes.name: font
attributes.description: Font name for text.

attributes.name: fontSize
attributes.description: Font size for text.

attributes.name: italic
attributes.description: Yes for italicized text, No for normal text. Default is No.

attributes.name: bold
attributes.description: Yes for boldface text, No for medium text. Default is No.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Height value of the control, in pixels.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Width value of the control, in pixels.

attributes.name: vSpace
attributes.description: Vertical spacing of the control, in pixels.

attributes.name: hSpace
attributes.description: Horizontal spacing of the control, in pixels.

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Alignment value.

attributes.name: bgColor
attributes.description: Background color of the control.

attributes.name: textColor
attributes.description: Text color for the control. See bgColor for color options.

attributes.name: maxLength
attributes.description: The maximum length of text entered.

attributes.name: notSupported
attributes.description:
The text to display if the page containing a Java applet-based
	cfform control is opened by a browser that does not support Java or has Java support disabled.
